attributes.action: To stop the demolition and redevelopment of Clarence Terrace Car Park/ Ex South Wales bus garage,
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the demolition and redevelopment of Clarence Terrace Car Park/ Ex South Wales bus garage, Swansea City Centre for the Swansea Bus Museum to house vehicles for use by First Cwmru and Swansea City( After Building Repair work is undertaken)(Non Gov Source). The Ex Bus Garage will not be used as a workshop so no noise pollution to annoy any nearby tenants/residents..,
Specific bus routes will be chosen.
buses will be removed and taken to the quadrant in the mornings and placed back at Clarence terrace in the early evening, A small area selling memorabilia,Printed Cups,Shirts & key rings
possibly refreshments.

rejection.details: This is not the responsibility of the HM Government – it’s a devolved issue, and the responsibility of the Welsh Government.
